name: notifications
description: Notification Service - Email, SMS, Push, Slack, WhatsApp

scripts.build: tsc && node esbuild.config.js && cp -r src/templates dist/templates
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npx sls deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run build && npx sls deploy --stage staging
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run build && npx sls deploy --stage prod
scripts.localstack:create-deployment: aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 apigateway create-deployment --rest-api-id $(aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 apigateway get-rest-apis --query "items[?contains(name,'notifications')].id" --output text) --stage-name test
scripts.deploy:test: npm run build && npx sls deploy --stage test --config serverless.localstack.yml
scripts.test:e2e:deployed: API_BASE_URL=http://$(aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4566 apigateway get-rest-apis --query "items[?name=='qshelter-notifications-test'].id" --output text).execute-api.localhost.localstack.cloud:4566/test npm run test:e2e
